<meta name="description" content="Wolf&Whale brings together the senior experience across UX/UI design, branding, copywriting, and web development without the excess. So you get the deep knowledge that comes with experience at places like Apple and Netflix, but a flat structure so the knowledge can be put into action more quickly." />

yoast_head_json.description: Wolf&Whale brings together the senior experience across UX/UI design, branding, copywriting, and web development without the excess. So you get the deep knowledge that comes with experience at places like Apple and Netflix, but a flat structure so the knowledge can be put into action more quickly.
